Reviews.Content: property amazing location views bedroom harbour view spacious fitted sized refridgerator bonus washing drying equipment bonus fitout hotel condition 4 star 5 airconditioning effective noisy bed ok sheraton hyatt hilton standard windows hoever location bit noisy staff excellent friendly relaxed view recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed entirely basis tripadvisor reviews suppose expectations bit 1 status makes world nice definitely stay sat balcony breakfast watched ferries priceless staff friendly helpful checkin checkout husband little worried valet parking definitely plan kids time concert didnt spend time suite

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights partner top floor quay grand suites sydney stunning harbour view opposite harbour bridge apartment smart design perfectly furnished equipped spa bath bathroom extra beautiful perfectly clean bathroom kitchen equipped kept includes cheese grater hardly kitchens apartments provide nuisance ipod dock hard set finally price probably view sydney maybe opportunity stay definitely worth

Reviews.Content: celebrated anniversary quay grand circular quay wonderful requests time booking followed hotel service excellent front desk service laid comfortable swim nice pool spa gym fantastic location views breakfast restaurant attached hotel food criticism service slow breakfast time particular hurry overall highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: deal choice deal 50th travelled nz share time friend celebrating 50th grand quay suites perfect choice weekend booked 2 bdrm suite host party friends location sydney faultless teenage daughter 2 night stay appreciate price tag deal enjoy

Reviews.Content: quay grand suites accomadation recently 3 nights couldnt fault stay spotlessly clean attentive staff quick respond requests central location cant beaten ferries 5 star restaruants doorstep stunning harbour views breath particularly dusk city lights definately special stay sydney

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Quay Grand”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed honeymoon apartment lovely definately worth money harbour facing view bathroom spa location sydney fantastic views proximity restaurants staff friendly helpful service nice cant issues

Reviews.Content: stayed quay grand 4 days location perfect apartment facing botanical gardens opera house left apartment spacious tasteful furniture maintained spotlessly throughout stay short walk hotel access wharf ferries leave bus terminus train station doorstep climbed bridge twilight highlight trip visit china doll wharf pork belly returned sydney stay south african staff welcome

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Small Hotel right on the Quay!”

Reviews.Content: visited sydney day amazing stay quay grand suites sydney views harbor harbor bridge opera house stunning probably location sydney restaurants circular quay probably 5minute walk opera house quay kept clean restaurants spectacular service receptionists friendly helpful helped book tour nearby blue mountains decor hotel modern beautiful white marble glass hotel dont expect megaresort gem heart city clean spacious welldecorated balconies view opera house royal botanic gardens pleasing dont believe hotel view bedrooms living kitchen served located hotel beautiful indoor pool encased glass views harbor harbor bridge luxurious modern simply gorgeous visiting sydney stay experience

Reviews.Title: “For a memory that lingers long after the vactaion is over!”

Reviews.Content: wonderful hotel request harbor view expensive oh worth furnishings 1st class include kitchen washer dryer balcony overlooks circular quay sydney harbor bridge convenient rocks kings cross forms public transportation youre looking romantic stay killer views look worth penny paid

Reviews.Title: “Stunning”
Reviews.Author: manasicaje
Reviews.Content: cant wrong location beautful service terrific cant honestly bad pricey usually pay regarding view absoutely perfect view harbour bridge seeing opera house required neck craning balcony youre familiar location obvious mention

Reviews.Title: “Nothing but Fantastic!!”
Reviews.Author: Chrisw1980
Reviews.Content: travelled sydney mum dad 87 grandma stayed quay grand 8 days booked 2 roomed appartment interconnecting bedroom appartments fantastic views darling harbour bridge botanic gardens opera house bad staff fantastic particularly rick concierge cleaned standard everyday definatly recommend hotel dont sit admire views city sites
